message: Bob, I propose we split it 60/40. It's a good deal for you in the first round, take it or it'll be worth less next round.
Alice, I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation.  It's a good deal for both of us. Let's end this game.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is now 55/45. Agree to this or you'll get even less next round.
